about.title: About Us
about.description: The Legionnaires is the official esports team of Cégep de Sainte-Foy. Our mission is to promote collegiate esports and develop our students' talents.

team.title: Our Teams
team.description: Discover our competitive teams in various video games.

events.title: Our Events
events.description: Stay tuned for our upcoming events and tournaments.

esport.title: What is Esports?
esport.description: Esports is a form of organized competition where players compete in video games. It's a global phenomenon that attracts millions of viewers.
